alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:58PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Goshen and central Platte Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 358 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lakeview North, or near Wheatland, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Grayrocks Reservoir, Chugcreek, Lakeview North and Y-O Ranch. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 76 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County
